thread.title: Married At First Sight’s Cheryl Maitland slams follower for calling her fame hungry
thread.title_full: Married At First Sight’s Cheryl Maitland slams follower for calling her fame hungry | Daily Telegraph

author: Lou Parker
title: Married At First Sight’s Cheryl Maitland slams follower for calling her fame hungry
text:
Married At First Sight star Cheryl Maitland has lashed out at haters, following claims she’s only on the reality TV show for fame.
The Gold Coast local made headlines when her “commitment wedding” to Jonathan Troughton came to an abrupt end, with the 25-year-old deciding to continue the experiment with jilted groom Andrew Jones after he was ditched by Lauren Bran.
media_camera Cheryl has lashed out at haters, following claims she’s only on the reality TV for fame. Picture: Nigel Wright
But just as viewers held high hopes for the new pair, Scottish-born beauty Maitland shocked fans when she refused to kiss firefighter Andrew during home visits, which sparked rumours she may not be on the show for the right reasons.
media_camera Viewers held high hopes for Andrew and Cheryl.
Clearly sick of the hate, Maitland decided to make an example out of one commenter.
“You’re a f**king B***H! Only on the show for ‘fame’ f**king s**t!” the follower wrote.
The star bit back, taking a screen shot of the mean comment and reposting it with the caption: “Why are you following me? Bye Felicia”.
She accompanied the send-off with a thinking and laughing cry emoji.
media_camera Maitland decided to make an example out of one commenter on Tuesday. Picture: Instagram.
Despite her reasons for entering the experiment, Maitland is receiving more than her fair share of attention. Just last week a video emerged of her snorting powder off her breasts.
The scandalous video, which the hairdresser strangely posted on Instagram years ago, shows her holding a rolled $50 note to her chest before snorting a white powder.
Maitland responded to the clip by saying she seriously regrets it.
media_camera Cheryl Maitland snorting a white powder through a straw off her breast. media_camera Maitland says she regrets posting the video. Picture: @belltowertimes
“I posted this video as a joke on my Instagram account several years ago,” she said. “Looking back I now realise what an extremely naive thing it was to have done, and I seriously regret it.”
The video was leaked the same day The Daily Telegraph received provocative images of the former glamour model standing topless on a balcony alongside a female companion.
media_camera Married at First Sight Contestant, Cheryl Maitland is receiving more than her fair share of attention. Source: Instagram
